description: support searching for a patient by birthdate and family name
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Patient resources matching the specified birthdate and family

description: support searching for a patient by date of death and family name
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Patient resources matching the specified death-date and family

description: support searching for a patient by birthdate and a string match of any part of name
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Patient resources matching the specified birthdate and name

imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all !Patient resources matching the specified family and gender

description: support searching for all *active* conditions for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and all "active" statuses (active,relapse,remission). This will *exclude* Conditions with no `clinicalStatus` specified.

description: support searching for all problems or health concerns or encounter diagnosis for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and category = "{{include.category | default: '[category]'}}".

description: support searching for all *active* problems or health concerns or  *active* encounter diagnosis for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and category = "{{include.category | default: '[category]'}}" for all "active" statuses (active,relapse,remission). This will *exclude* Conditions with no `clinicalStatus` specified.

description: support searching for all problems or health concerns or encounter diagnosis for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient, encounter, and category = "{{include.category | default: '[category]'}}". {% if include.category == 'encounter-diagnosis' %}When category = "encounter-diagnosis" will return the encounter diagnosis for the encounter.{% endif %}

description: support searching for a particular condition for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and code.

description: support searching for all conditions for a patient for a specified time period
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and date.

description: support searching for all conditions for a patient for a specified time period
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and date.

description: support searching for all conditions for a patient for a specified time period
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and date.

description: support searching for all conditions for a patient for a specified time period
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and date.
Fetches a bundle of all Condition resources for the specified patient and _lastUpdated. See the US Core General Guidance page for [Searching Using lastUpdated].

description: support searching for all *active*  or *inactive* allergies for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all AllergyIntolerance resources for the specified patient and status code.  This will not return any "entered in error" resources because of the conditional presence of the clinicalStatus element.

description: support searching for all immunizations for a patient for a specified time period
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Immunization resources for the specified patient and date

description: support searching for all administered immunizations for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Immunization resources for the specified patient and status

description: support searching for all laboratory reports for a patient for a given status (for example completed reports )
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all DiagnosticReport resources for the specified patient and status

description: support searching for all laboratory reports
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all DiagnosticReport resources for the specified patient and a category code = "{{include.category | default: '[category]'}}"

description: support searching for all laboratory reports by code  (for example, search for all metabolic panel reports for a patient, or search for all cbcs, metabolic panels, and urinalysis panels for a patient)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all DiagnosticReport resources for the specified patient and report code(s). SHOULD support search by multiple report codes.

description: support searching for all laboratory reports by date
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all DiagnosticReport resources for the specified patient and date and a category code = "{{include.category | default: '[category]'}}"
Fetches a bundle of all DiagnosticReport resources for the specified patient and category and _lastUpdated. See the US Core General Guidance page for [Searching Using lastUpdated].

description: support searching for laboratory reports by code and date (for example, search for all metabolic panel reports since 2019 for a patient)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all DiagnosticReport resources for the specified patient and date and report code(s). SHOULD support search by multiple report codes.

description: support searching for all goals for a patient for a given status (for example active goals)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Goal resources for the specified patient and lifecycle-status

description: support searching for all goals for a patient by date
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Goal resources for the specified patient and target-date

description: support searching for all medications that have been prescribed to a patient. See the [Medication List Guidance] section for guidance on accessing a patient medications. The server application represents the medication using either an inline code or a contained or external reference to the Medication resource.
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all MedicationRequest resources for the specified patient and intent code = `order,plan`

description: support searching for all prescriptions for a patient for a given status (for example all active prescriptions)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all MedicationRequest resources for the specified patient and intent  code = `order,plan` and status

description: support searching for all prescriptions for a patient for a given status (for example all active prescriptions)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all MedicationRequest resources for the specified patient and intent  code = `order,plan` and encounter

description: support searching for all prescriptions for a patient by date
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all MedicationRequest resources for the specified patient and intent  code = `order,plan` and authoredon date

description: support searching for all medications for a patient for a given status (for example all active medications)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all !MedicationStatement resources for the specified patient and status

description: support searching for all medications for a patient by date
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all MedicationStatement resources for the specified patient and date

description: support searching for all procedures for a patient for a given status (for example all completed procedures)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Procedure resources for the specified patient and status

description: support searching for all procedures for a patient by date
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Procedure resources for the specified patient and date

description: support searching for procedures for a patient by code and date
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Procedure resources for the specified patient and date and procedure code(s).  SHOULD support search by multiple codes.

description: support searching for all laboratory results for a patient for a given status (for example all observations marked as final)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Observation resources for the specified patient and category = `laboratory` and status

description: support searching for all laboratory results
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Observation resources for the specified patient and a category code = `laboratory`

description: support searching for all laboratory results by code (for example, search for all blood glucose lab results for a patient,  or search for all  blood glucose, urine glucose and urine ketones for a patient)
example:
GET [base]/Observation?patient=1134281&code=http://loinc.org\|{{include.code1 | default: '[code]'}}
      {% if include.code2 %}2. GET [base]/Observation?patient=1134281&code=http://loinc.org\|{{include.code1 | default: '[code]'}},http://loinc.org\|{{include.code2 | default: '[code]'}},http://loinc.org\|{{include.code3 | default: '[code]'}}{% endif %}
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Observation resources for the specified patient and observation code(s).  SHOULD support search by multiple report codes. The Observation `code` parameter searches `Observation.code only.

description: support searching for all laboratory results by date (for example, find all the laboratory results after 2018-03-14.)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Observation resources for the specified patient and date and a category code = `laboratory`
Fetches a bundle of all Observation resources for the specified patient and category and _lastUpdated. See the US Core General Guidance page for [Searching Using lastUpdated].

description: support searching laboratory results by code and date (for example, search for all blood glucose lab results since 2019 for a patient)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all Observation resources for the specified patient and date and report code(s).  SHOULD support search by multiple report codes.

description: support searching for all patient assessments and plans of treatment for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all CarePlan resources for the specified patient and category=`assess-plan`

description: support searching for all assessment and plan of treatment for a patient within a time period
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all CarePlan resources for the specified patient and category=`assess-plan` and date

description: support searching for all *active* assessment and plan of treatment for a patient
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all CarePlan resources for the specified patient and category=`assess-plan` and status=`active`

description: support searching for all *active* assessment and plan of treatment for a patient within a time period
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all CarePlan resources for the specified patient and category=`assess-plan` and status=`active` and date

description: support searching for all current care team members for a patient. DOES THIS DO ANYTHING?
imp_note:
Fetches a bundle of all CareTeam resources for the specified patient and status =`active` and may include CareTeam Patient, RelatedPerson and Practitioner and PractitionerRole participants.  
To get Practitioner name and identifier using PractitionerRole:  
1) Search for the careteam PractitionerRole: GET [base]/CareTeam?patient=[id]&status=active&_include=CareTeam:participant:PractitionerRole  
2) using the FHIR _id from the PractitionerRole.practitioner element resource,  fetch the Practitioner resources using  GET [base]/Practitioner?_id=[id]

description: support searching for all documents for a patient for a given status (for example completed reports )
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all DocumentReference resources for the specified patient and status. See the implementation notes above for how to access the actual document.

description: support searching for all documents for a patient for a given status (for example completed reports )
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all !DocumentReference resources for the specified patient and period. See the implementation notes above for how to access the actual document.

description: support searching for all clinical notes for a given patient

description: support searching for all clinical notes for a given patient by date (for example, since 2019)

description: support searching for a specific note type for a patient

description: support searching for all  reports by code

description: support searching for prescriptions for a patient based on their dispensed status
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all MedicationDispense resources for the specified patient that have a given dispense status (e.g., dispensed, not dispensed)).

description: support searching for prescriptions for a patient based on their dispensed status and dispense type.
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all MedicationDispense resources for the specified patient that have a given dispense status (e.g., dispensed, not dispensed) and type of dispense (e.g., partially dispensed).

description: support searching for prescriptions for a patient based on when it was dispensed to the patient.
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all MedicationDispense resources for the specified patient for a given dispense and date or range
Fetches a bundle of all RelatedPerson resources for the specified patient that may match any of the string fields in the name element (including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text)

description: support searching for family member’s condition for a patient (e.g., all family members with breast cancer)
imp_note: Fetches a bundle of all FamilyMemberHistory resources for the specified patient and condition
